#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;

long long check[10000001];
bool prime[10000001]={false};
void seive(long long n)
{
	    long long i,j;
	    j=2;
	    while(2*j<=10000001)
	 	{
	 				check[2*j]=2;
	 				prime[2*j]=true;
	 				j++;
	 	} 
	 	j=3;		 
	    while(3*j<=10000001)
	 	{
	 				check[3*j]=3;
	 				prime[3*j]=true;
	 				j++;
	 	}
	  
	   for( i=5;i<=pow(10000001,0.5);i+=6)
	   {
	   	      if(prime[i]==false)
	   	      {
	   	         j=2;
	 			 while(i*j<=10000001)
	 			 {
	 				check[i*j]=i;
	 				prime[i*j]=true;
	 				j++;
	 			 } 
	   	      }
	   	      if(prime[i+2]==false)
	   	      {
				 j=2;
	   	         while((i+2)*j<=10000001)
	 			 {
	 				check[(i+2)*j]=i+2;
	 				prime[(i+2)*j]=true;
	 				j++;
	 			 } 
	   	      }
	   }
}

int main()
{
      
	  seive(10000001);
	  check[1]=1;
	  prime[1]=false;
	  prime[2]=false;
	  
	  long long t;
	  scanf("%lld",&t);
	  
	  while(t--)
	  {
	  	    long long i,j,n;
		    long long ans=1,temp=1;
	  	    scanf("%lld",&n);
	  	
	  	    while(prime[n])
	  	    {
	  	        i=check[n];
	  	        temp=1;
				while(n%i==0 && n>1)
				{
				    temp=temp*i;
					n=n/i;	
				}  	
				ans=ans*((temp*temp*i+1)/(i+1));
			}
			ans=ans*(n*n-n+1);
	  	    printf("%lld\n",ans);
	  }	
}
